original: Berglund, Felix Bertil, direktör, Linköping, f. 29/6/97 i Sundsvall av post-tj :man Ernst B. o. Anna Karlsson. G. 22 m. Anna Gyllenkrok. Barn: Nils f. 24. — Stud:ex. 16, Gbgs hand:inst. 18. Anst. v. Sv. gen :kons. i Köpenhamn 18-20, kansl. v. beskickn. i To-kio o. Peking 20-21, huv:bokhåll. i firma J. A. Kjellberg & Sons i Tokio 21-22, lantbr. i Uppl. 23-28, bitr. ombudsman i Gävleb. allm. valm:förb. 28, insp., sederm. inköpschef i Ford Motor Company A-B i Sthlm 28-33, kamrer, sederm. v. verkst. dir. i A-B Alka aluminiumkapslar i Linköp. (num. A-B Wicanders korkfabr.) fr. 33. Styr:suppl. där sed. 46.
translated: Berglund, Felix Bertil, director, Linköping, b. June 29, 1897 in Sundsvall to postal worker Ernst B. and Anna Karlsson. Married on February 22, to Anna Gyllenkrok. Children: Nils b. 1924. Completed high school exams in 1916 and graduated from Gothenburg business school in 1918. Employed by Swedish consulates in Copenhagen from 1918-1920, worked in the embassy offices in Tokyo and Beijing in 1920-1921, was head bookkeeper for J.A. Kjellberg & Sons in Tokyo from 1921-1922, worked in agriculture in Uppland from 1923-1928. Became an Assistant Officer in the Gävleborg constituency in 1928, then inspector and later purchasing manager at Ford Motor Company from 1928-1933. Employed as an accountant and then managing director of A-B Alka Aluminum Capsules in Linköping (now A-B Wicanders cork factory) from 1933. Is a deputy board member since 1946.
